ygData.subject: Re: Lost Dugeons of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: We just recently got real computers rather than dumb terminals at my place of business. They are not giving line level workers access to the Internet. The
ygData.messageBody:
We just recently got real computers rather than dumb terminals at my
place of business. They are not giving line level workers access to
the Internet. The management has their (place name of common orifice
here) bound too tight. Yes, it is a government job.

Still, can't complain. Good job, and I just got DSL on the new
computer my son bought. Have to get this one up for network, then it
will be a little better.

Barto


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "McDonald, Maureen L"
<Maureen.L.McDonald@e...> wrote:
> Wow!
> You are a fortunate individual. If I downloaded a game at work I'd
> better have a resume ready! Sad thing is, I think our network would be
> great for LAN parties, what a waste :p
>
> _____
>
> From: Enie [mailto:dawn_marie@m...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 11, 2003 10:41 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Lost Dugeons of Norrath
>
>
> Wooohooo! I brought my laptop to work and downloaded LDoN on the T1
> line and it only took 27 minutes, far cry from 23 hours LOL. I am
> headed home for lunch to play :)
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> >
> > Yeah. If you opt to get the download only version you might want to
> suck up
> > to a friend to burn copies of the files onto a CD and send to you.
> > I was shocked when I found a woman in the hardware store in this
> small town
> > who actually plays EQ.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > Awhile back they had a patch where you could opt to download it in
> smaller
> > chunks as they became available... all you had to do was click on
> yes.
> > This is exactly what they were tryign to avoid because the network
> traffic
> > ties up the bandwidth when people do this and nobody can connect.
> >
> > T1 will still take a good chunk of time, but not an entire day.
> >
> > Wulfric
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Enie
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, September 10, 2003 11:50 AM
> > Subject: [EverQuest] Lost Dugeons of Norrath
> >
> >
> > I did something really stupid last night. I logged into Everquest
> and
> > opted to purchase LDoN online. One suggestion, DON'T do it if you
> > have a 56K dial-up connection LOL. It started to download and
> said it
> > would take 22 hours and 26 minutes! I guess I will take my laptop
> to
> > work and download it on the T1 LOL. Sheesh!
> >
